Text: This is a global initiative to empower women economically through trade and investment. The project seeks to connect three million women to markets by 2021. Through this project, two hundred and fifty youths have been trained and deployed for service.
Cause: This is a global initiative to empower women economically through trade and investment.
Effect: The project seeks to connect three million women to markets by 2021.
Sentence: <e1>This is a global initiative to empower women economically through trade and investment.</e1> <e2>The project seeks to connect three million women to markets by 2021.</e2> Through this project, two hundred and fifty youths have been trained and deployed for service.
